price: San keessa yaadannootu jira, Nama onnee qabuuf yookin gurra itti kennuuf,haala yeroo (gorsa) irratti hirmaataa taheen.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika ladhik'rā liman kāna lahu qalbun aw alqā al-samʿa wahuwa shahīdun
